text: I am trying to create a listing page for upcoming and recorded webinars. Is it best practice to use HubDB or create a new blog for this?
I am really having trouble wrapping my head around the concept of dynamic pages with hubdb

:wave: new to HubSpot development. I posted a question in chatflows and workflows but I'm not sure if that was the correct place. Have a question about pushing data back to HubSpot based on conversationId or through the live chat widget: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C019VT42R8X/p1642797353063100>
